description:
Dubbed the "idol queen", she is a popular idol. She is very polite and considerate. She advises Kirari to regard idols and fans equally since they share common feelings. Currently, Aoi is graduated from being an idol.
Name Origin: "kiri" refers to fog or mist, "sawa" refers to valley or swamp, "aoi" refers to indigo or blue
name: Kirisawa Aoi
